verses.verse: וּבִ֨נְיָמִ֔ן <WH1144> u-Vin-ya-Min, Now Benjamin הוֹלִ֖יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בֶּ֣לַע <WH1106> Be-la' Bela בְּכֹר֑וֹ <WH1060> be-cho-Ro; his firstborn אַשְׁבֵּל֙ <WH788> 'ash-Bel Ashbel הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <WH8145> hash-she-Ni, the second וְאַחְרַ֖ח <WH315> ve-'ach-Rach and Aharah הַשְּׁלִישִֽׁי׃ <WH7992> hash-she-li-Shi. the third
נוֹחָה֙ <WH5119> no-Chah Nohah הָֽרְבִיעִ֔י <WH7243> ha-re-vi-'I, the fourth וְרָפָ֖א <WH7498> ve-ra-Fa and Rapha הַחֲמִישִֽׁי׃ <WH2549> ha-cha-mi-Shi. the fifth ס sa-Mek

וַיִּהְי֥וּ <WH1961> vai-yih-Yu had בָנִ֖ים <WH1121> va-Nim And the sons לְבָ֑לַע <WH1106> le-Va-la'; of Bela אַדָּ֥ר <WH146> 'ad-Dar were Addar וְגֵרָ֖א <WH1617> ve-ge-Ra and Gera וַאֲבִיהֽוּד׃ <WH31> va-'a-vi-Hud. and Abihud
וַאֲבִישׁ֥וּעַ <WH50> va-'a-vi-Shu-a' And Abishua וְנַעֲמָ֖ן <WH5283> ve-na-'a-Man and Naaman וַאֲחֽוֹחַ׃ <WH265> va-'a-Cho-ach. and Ahoah
וְגֵרָ֥א <WH1617> ve-ge-Ra And Gera וּשְׁפוּפָ֖ן <WH8197> u-she-fu-Fan and Shephuphan וְחוּרָֽם׃ <WH2361> ve-chu-Ram. and Huram

וְאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> ve-'El-leh These בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei And these [are] the sons אֵח֑וּד <WH261> 'e-Chud; of Ehud אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh these הֵ֞ם <WH1992> hem like רָאשֵׁ֤י <WH7218> ra-Shei these are the heads אָבוֹת֙ <WH1> a-Vot of the fathers לְי֣וֹשְׁבֵי <WH3427> le-Yoo-she-vei of the inhabitants גֶ֔בַע <WH1387> Ge-va', of Geba וַיַּגְל֖וּם <WH1540> vai-yag-Lum and they removed אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מָנָֽחַת׃ <WH4506> ma-Na-chat. them to Manahath

וְנַעֲמָ֧ן <WH5283> ve-na-'a-Man And Naaman וַאֲחִיָּ֛ה <WH281> va-'a-chi-Yah and Ahiah וְגֵרָ֖א <WH1617> ve-ge-Ra and Gera ה֣וּא <WH1931> hu he הֶגְלָ֑ם <WH1540> heg-Lam; he removed וְהוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> ve-ho-Lid them and begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עֻזָּ֖א <WH5798> 'uz-Za Uzza וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et אֲחִיחֻֽד׃ <WH284> 'a-chi-Chud. and Ahihud

וְשַׁחֲרַ֗יִם <WH7842> ve-sha-cha-Ra-yim, And Shaharaim הוֹלִיד֙ <WH3205> ho-Lid begat בִּשְׂדֵ֣ה <WH7704> bis-Deh [children] in the country מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> mo-'Av, of Moab מִן־ <WH4480> min- after שִׁלְח֖וֹ <WH7971> shil-Cho he had sent them away אֹתָ֑ם <WH853> 'o-Tam; חוּשִׁ֥ים <WH2366> chu-Shim Hushim וְאֶֽת־ <WH853> ve-'Et בַּעֲרָ֖א <WH1199> ba-'a-Ra and Baara נָשָֽׁיו׃ <WH802> na-Shav. [were] his wives

וַיּ֖וֹלֶד <WH3205> vai-Yo-led And he begat מִן־ <WH4480> min- By חֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2321> Cho-desh of Hodesh אִשְׁתּ֑וֹ <WH802> ish-To; his wife אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יוֹבָב֙ <WH3103> yo-Vav Jobab וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et צִבְיָ֔א <WH6644> tziv-Ya, and Zibia וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מֵישָׁ֖א <WH4331> mei-Sha and Mesha וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מַלְכָּֽם׃ <WH4445> mal-Kam. and Malcham

וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et יְע֥וּץ <WH3263> ye-'Utz And Jeuz וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et שָֽׂכְיָ֖ה <WH7634> sa-che-Yah and Shachia וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מִרְמָ֑ה <WH4821> mir-Mah; and Mirma אֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh These בָנָ֖יו <WH1121> va-Nav These [were] his sons רָאשֵׁ֥י <WH7218> ra-Shei heads אָבֽוֹת׃ <WH1> a-Vot. of the fathers

וּמֵחֻשִׁ֛ים <WH2366> u-me-chu-Shim And of Hushim הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> ho-Lid he begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֲבִיט֖וּב <WH36> 'a-vi-Tuv Abitub וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et אֶלְפָּֽעַל׃ <WH508> 'el-Pa-'al. and Elpaal

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei The sons אֶלְפַּ֔עַל <WH508> 'el-Pa-'al, of Elpaal עֵ֥בֶר <WH5677> 'E-ver Eber וּמִשְׁעָ֖ם <WH4936> u-mish-'Am and Misham וָשָׁ֑מֶד <WH8106> va-Sha-med; and Shamed ה֚וּא <WH1931> hu who בָּנָ֣ה <WH1129> ba-Nah who built אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אוֹנ֔וֹ <WH207> o-No, Ono וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et לֹ֖ד <WH3850> lod and Lod וּבְנֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <WH1323> u-ve-no-Tei-ha. with the towns

וּבְרִעָ֣ה <WH1283> u-ve-ri-'Ah Beriah וָשֶׁ֔מַע <WH8087> va-She-ma', also and Shema הֵ֚מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah who רָאשֵׁ֣י <WH7218> ra-Shei [were] heads הָאָב֔וֹת <WH1> ha-'a-Vot, of the fathers לְיוֹשְׁבֵ֖י <WH3427> le-yo-she-Vei of the inhabitants אַיָּל֑וֹן <WH357> ai-ya-Lon; of Aijalon הֵ֥מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah who הִבְרִ֖יחוּ <WH1272> hiv-Ri-chu who drove away אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- י֥וֹשְׁבֵי <WH3427> Yoo-she-vei the inhabitants גַֽת׃ <WH1661> Gat. of Gath
וְאַחְי֥וֹ <WH283> ve-'ach-Yo And Ahio שָׁשָׁ֖ק <WH8349> sha-Shak Shashak וִירֵמֽוֹת׃ <WH3406> vi-re-Mot. and Jeremoth
וּזְבַדְיָ֥ה <WH2069> u-ze-vad-Yah And Zebadiah וַעֲרָ֖ד <WH6166> va-'a-Rad and Arad וָעָֽדֶר׃ <WH5738> va-'A-der. and Ader

וּמִיכָאֵ֧ל <WH4317> u-mi-cha-'El And Michael וְיִשְׁפָּ֛ה <WH3472> ve-yish-Pah and Ispah וְיוֹחָ֖א <WH3109> ve-yo-Cha and Joha בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei the sons בְרִיעָֽה׃ <WH1283> ve-ri-'Ah. of Beriah
וּזְבַדְיָ֥ה <WH2069> u-ze-vad-Yah And Zebadiah וּמְשֻׁלָּ֖ם <WH4918> u-me-shul-Lam and Meshullam וְחִזְקִ֥י <WH2395> ve-chiz-Ki and Hezeki וָחָֽבֶר׃ <WH2268> va-Cha-ver. and Heber

וְיִשְׁמְרַ֧י <WH3461> ve-yish-me-Rai Ishmerai וְיִזְלִיאָ֛ה <WH3152> ve-yiz-li-'Ah also and Jezliah וְיוֹבָ֖ב <WH3103> ve-yo-Vav and Jobab בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei the sons אֶלְפָּֽעַל׃ <WH508> 'el-Pa-'al. of Elpaal
וְיָקִ֥ים <WH3356> ve-ya-Kim And Jakim וְזִכְרִ֖י <WH2147> ve-zich-Ri and Zichri וְזַבְדִּֽי׃ <WH2067> ve-zav-Di. and Zabdi
וֶאֱלִיעֵנַ֥י <WH462> ve-'e-li-'e-Nai And Elienai וְצִלְּתַ֖י <WH6769> ve-tzil-le-Tai and Zilthai וֶאֱלִיאֵֽל׃ <WH447> ve-'e-li-'El. and Eliel

וַעֲדָיָ֧ה <WH5718> va-'a-da-Yah And Adaiah וּבְרָאיָ֛ה <WH1256> u-ve-ra-Yah and Beraiah וְשִׁמְרָ֖ת <WH8119> ve-shim-Rat and Shimrath בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei the sons שִׁמְעִֽי׃ <WH8096> shim-'I. of Shimhi
וְיִשְׁפָּ֥ן <WH3473> ve-yish-Pan And Ishpan וָעֵ֖בֶר <WH5677> va-'E-ver and Heber וֶאֱלִיאֵֽל׃ <WH447> ve-'e-li-'El. and Eliel
וְעַבְדּ֥וֹן <WH5658> ve-'av-Don And Abdon וְזִכְרִ֖י <WH2147> ve-zich-Ri and Zichri וְחָנָֽן׃ <WH2605> ve-cha-Nan. and Hanan
וַחֲנַנְיָ֥ה <WH2608> va-cha-nan-Yah And Hananiah וְעֵילָ֖ם <WH5867> ve-'ei-Lam and Elam וְעַנְתֹתִיָּֽה׃ <WH6070> ve-'an-to-ti-Yah. and Antothijah
וְיִפְדְיָ֥ה <WH3301> ve-yif-de-Yah And Iphedeiah; וּפְנִיאֵל u-fe-ni-'el כוּפְנוּאֵ֖ל <WH6439> u-fe-nu-'El Peniel קבְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei the sons שָׁשָֽׁק׃ <WH8349> sha-Shak. of Shashak
וְשַׁמְשְׁרַ֥י <WH8125> ve-sham-she-Rai And Shamsherai וּשְׁחַרְיָ֖ה <WH7841> u-she-char-Yah and Shehariah וַעֲתַלְיָֽה׃ <WH6271> va-'a-tal-Yah. and Athaliah

וְיַעֲרֶשְׁיָ֧ה <WH3298> ve-ya-'a-resh-Yah And Jaresiah וְאֵלִיָּ֛ה <WH452> ve-'e-li-Yah and Eliah וְזִכְרִ֖י <WH2147> ve-zich-Ri and Zichri בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei the sons יְרֹחָֽם׃ <WH3395> ye-ro-Cham. of Jeroham

אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh These רָאשֵׁ֥י <WH7218> ra-Shei These [were] heads אָב֛וֹת <WH1> a-Vot of the fathers לְתֹלְדוֹתָ֖ם <WH8435> le-to-le-do-Tam by their generations רָאשִׁ֑ים <WH7218> ra-Shim; chief אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh who יָשְׁב֥וּ <WH3427> ya-she-Vu [men] These dwelt בִירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> vi-ru-sha-Lim. in Jerusalem ס sa-Mek

וּבְגִבְע֥וֹן <WH1391> u-ve-giv-'on And at Gibeon יָשְׁב֖וּ <WH3427> ya-she-Vu dwelt אֲבִ֣י <WH1> 'a-Vi the father גִבְע֑וֹן <WH1391> giv-'on; of Gibeon וְשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> ve-Shem name אִשְׁתּ֖וֹ <WH802> ish-To whose wife's מַעֲכָֽה׃ <WH4601> ma-'a-Chah. [was] Maachah

וּבְנ֥וֹ <WH1121> u-ve-No son הַבְּכ֖וֹר <WH1060> hab-be-Chor And his firstborn עַבְדּ֑וֹן <WH5658> av-Don; Abdon וְצ֥וּר <WH6698> ve-Tzur and Zur וְקִ֖ישׁ <WH7027> ve-Kish and Kish וּבַ֥עַל <WH1168> u-Va-'al and Baal וְנָדָֽב׃ <WH5070> ve-na-Dav. and Nadab
וּגְד֥וֹר <WH1446> u-ge-Dor And Gedor וְאַחְי֖וֹ <WH283> ve-'ach-Yo and Ahio וָזָֽכֶר׃ <WH2144> va-Za-cher. and Zacher

וּמִקְל֖וֹת <WH4732> u-mik-Lot And Mikloth הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שִׁמְאָ֑ה <WH8039> shim-'Ah; Shimeah וְאַף־ <WH637> ve-'af- And these also הֵ֗מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah, like נֶ֧גֶד <WH5048> Ne-ged over against them אֲחֵיהֶ֛ם <WH251> 'a-chei-Hem with their brethren יָשְׁב֥וּ <WH3427> ya-she-Vu dwelt בִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> vi-ru-sha-Lim in Jerusalem עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with אֲחֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH251> 'a-chei-Hem. their relatives ס sa-Mek

וְנֵר֙ <WH5369> ve-Ner And Ner הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- קִ֔ישׁ <WH7027> Kish, Kish וְקִ֖ישׁ <WH7027> ve-Kish and Kish הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שָׁא֑וּל <WH7586> sha-'Ul; Saul וְשָׁא֗וּל <WH7586> ve-sha-'Ul, and Saul הוֹלִ֤יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהֽוֹנָתָן֙ <WH3083> ye-ho-na-Tan Jonathan וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מַלְכִּי־ mal-ki- שׁ֔וּעַ <WH4444> Shu-a', and Malchishua וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et אֲבִֽינָדָ֖ב <WH41> 'a-vi-na-Dav and Abinadab וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et אֶשְׁבָּֽעַל׃ <WH792> 'esh-Ba-'al. and Eshbaal

וּבֶן־ <WH1121> u-ven- And the son יְהוֹנָתָ֖ן <WH3083> ye-ho-na-Tan of Jonathan מְרִ֣יב me-Riv בָּ֑עַל <WH4807> Ba-'al; [was] Meribbaal וּמְרִ֥יב u-me-Riv בַּ֖עַל <WH4807> Ba-'al and Meribbaal הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מִיכָֽה׃ <WH4318> mi-Chah. Micah ס sa-Mek

וּבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons מִיכָ֑ה <WH4318> mi-Chah; of Micah פִּית֥וֹן <WH6377> pi-Ton [were] Pithon וָמֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4429> va-Me-lech and Melech וְתַאְרֵ֥עַ <WH8390> ve-ta'-Re-a' and Tarea וְאָחָֽז׃ <WH271> ve-'a-Chaz. and Ahaz

וְאָחָז֙ <WH271> ve-'a-Chaz And Ahaz הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוֹעַדָּ֔ה <WH3085> ye-ho-'ad-Dah, Jehoadah וִיהֽוֹעַדָּ֗ה <WH3085> vi-ho-'ad-Dah, and Jehoadah הוֹלִ֛יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עָלֶ֥מֶת <WH5964> 'a-Le-met Alemeth וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et עַזְמָ֖וֶת <WH5820> 'az-Ma-vet and Azmaveth וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et זִמְרִ֑י <WH2174> zim-Ri; and Zimri וְזִמְרִ֖י <WH2174> ve-zim-Ri and Zimri הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מוֹצָֽא׃ <WH4162> mo-Tza. Moza

וּמוֹצָ֖א <WH4162> u-mo-Tza And Moza הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בִּנְעָ֑א <WH1150> bin-'A; Binea רָפָ֥ה <WH7498> ra-Fah Rapha בְנ֛וֹ <WH1121> ve-No [was] his son אֶלְעָשָׂ֥ה <WH501> 'el-'a-Sah Eleasah בְנ֖וֹ <WH1121> ve-No his son אָצֵ֥ל <WH682> 'a-Tzel Azel בְּנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> be-No. his son

וּלְאָצֵל֮ <WH682> u-le-'a-Tzel And Azel שִׁשָּׁ֣ה <WH8337> shish-Shah had six בָנִים֒ <WH1121> va-Nim sons וְאֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> ve-'El-leh and these שְׁמוֹתָ֗ם <WH8034> she-mo-Tam, whose names עַזְרִיקָ֥ם׀ <WH5840> 'az-ri-Kam [are] these Azrikam בֹּ֙כְרוּ֙ <WH1074> bo-che-ru Bocheru וְיִשְׁמָעֵ֣אל <WH3458> ve-yish-ma-'El and Ishmael וּשְׁעַרְיָ֔ה <WH8187> u-she-'ar-Yah, and Sheariah וְעֹבַדְיָ֖ה <WH5662> ve-'oad-Yah and Obadiah וְחָנָ֑ן <WH2605> ve-cha-Nan; and Hanan כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- All אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh these בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei All these [were] the sons אָצַֽל׃ <WH682> 'a-Tzal. of Azel

וּבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons עֵ֣שֶׁק <WH6232> 'E-shek of Eshek אָחִ֑יו <WH251> 'a-Chiv; his brother אוּלָ֣ם <WH198> 'u-Lam [were] Ulam בְּכֹר֔וֹ <WH1060> be-cho-Ro, his firstborn יְעוּשׁ֙ <WH3266> ye-'Ush Jehush הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <WH8145> hash-she-Ni, the second וֶֽאֱלִיפֶ֖לֶט <WH467> ve-'e-li-Fe-let and Eliphelet הַשְּׁלִשִֽׁי׃ <WH7992> hash-she-li-Shi. the third

וַֽיִּהְי֣וּ <WH1961> vai-yih-Yu of בְנֵי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- And the sons א֠וּלָם <WH198> 'U-lom of Ulam אֲנָשִׁ֨ים <WH582> 'a-na-Shim men גִּבֹּרֵי־ <WH1368> gib-bo-rei- were mighty חַ֜יִל <WH2428> Cha-yil of valour דֹּ֣רְכֵי <WH1869> Do-re-chei archer קֶ֗שֶׁת <WH7198> Ke-shet, arch וּמַרְבִּ֤ים <WH7235> u-mar-Bim and had many בָּנִים֙ <WH1121> ba-Nim sons וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei and sons' בָנִ֔ים <WH1121> va-Nim, sons מֵאָ֖ה <WH3967> me-'Ah an hundred וַחֲמִשִּׁ֑ים <WH2572> va-cha-mish-Shim; and fifty כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- All אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh these מִבְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> mib-be-Nei All these [are] of the sons בִנְיָמִֽן׃ <WH1144> vin-ya-Min. of Benjamin פ Peh
